channel.description: Recent content in leadership on NYCKI Secretary Digest

item.title: Committees Applications (2023)
item.description: Overview Note: Registration is closed! In Circle K there are a number of Committees that carry out tasks that are needed for the district to run. Through being in these Committees members can get to know the workings of Circle K on a district level and if you become a chair, you can lead entire parts of the district. Note: If you become a chair, you can hold this positions while still holding a board position on the club level
